entries.name: TD Aerobatics 1
entries.description: If unit's HP = 100%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any infantry, armored, or cavalry ally within 2 spaces.

entries.name: TD Aerobatics 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any infantry, armored, or cavalry ally within 2 spaces.

entries.name: TD Aerobatics 3
entries.description: Unit can move to a space adjacent to any infantry, armored, or cavalry ally within 2 spaces.

entries.name: TD Atk/Def Link 1
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Def+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Atk/Def Link 2
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Atk/Def Link 3
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Def+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Atk Feint 1
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk-3 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

entries.name: TD Atk Feint 2
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk-5 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

entries.name: TD Atk Feint 3
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk-7 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

entries.name: TD Atk/Res Link 1
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Res+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Atk/Res Link 2
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Atk/Res Link 3
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Res+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Atk/Spd Link 1
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Spd+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Atk/Spd Link 2
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Spd+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Atk/Spd Link 3
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Atk/Spd Ruse 1
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Spd-1 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions. 【Guard】 Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: TD Atk/Spd Ruse 2
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Spd-3 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions. 【Guard】 Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: TD Atk/Spd Ruse 3
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions. 【Guard】 Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Axebreaker 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against an axe foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Axebreaker 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against an axe foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Axebreaker 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against an axe foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: B Tomebreaker 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a blue tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: B Tomebreaker 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a blue tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: B Tomebreaker 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a blue tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Beorc's Blessing
entries.description: Neutralizes cavalry and flying foes' bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

entries.name: Binding Shield
entries.description: In combat against a dragon foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot counterattack or make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: TD Blaze Dance 1
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+2 to target.

entries.name: TD Blaze Dance 2
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+3 to target.

entries.name: TD Blaze Dance 3
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+4 to target.

entries.name: Bold Fighter 1
entries.description: If unit's HP = 100% and unit initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

entries.name: Bold Fighter 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

entries.name: Bold Fighter 3
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

entries.name: Bowbreaker 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a colorless bow foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Bowbreaker 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a colorless bow foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Bowbreaker 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a colorless bow foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Brash Assault 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat against a foe that can counter and unit's HP ≤ 30%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

entries.name: Brash Assault 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat against a foe that can counter and unit's HP ≤ 40%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

entries.name: Brash Assault 3
entries.description: If unit initiates combat against a foe that can counter and unit's HP ≤ 50%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

entries.name: Bushido
entries.description: Deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

entries.name: TD Caldera Dance 1
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+2 and Def+3 to target.

entries.name: TD Caldera Dance 2
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+3 and Def+4 to target.

entries.name: TDC Cancel Affinity 1
entries.description: Neutralizes all weapon-triangle advantage granted by unit's and foe's skills.

entries.name: TDC Cancel Affinity 2
entries.description: Neutralizes weapon-triangle advantage granted by unit's skills. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, neutralizes weapon-triangle advantage granted by foe's skills.

entries.name: TDC Cancel Affinity 3
entries.description: Neutralizes weapon-triangle advantage granted by unit's skills. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reverses weapon-triangle advantage granted by foe's skills.

entries.name: TD Chill Atk 1
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk through its next action.

entries.name: TD Chill Atk 2
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk through its next action.

entries.name: TD Chill Atk 3
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk through its next action.

entries.name: TD Chill Def 1
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Def through its next action.

entries.name: TD Chill Def 2
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Def through its next action.

entries.name: TD Chill Def 3
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Def through its next action.

entries.name: TD Chill Res 1
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Res through its next action.

entries.name: TD Chill Res 2
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Res through its next action.

entries.name: TD Chill Res 3
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Res-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Res through its next action.

entries.name: TD Chill Spd 1
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-3 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd through its next action.

entries.name: TD Chill Spd 2
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-5 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd through its next action.

entries.name: TD Chill Spd 3
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Spd through its next action.

entries.name: TD Chilling Seal
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, inflicts Atk/Spd-6 on foe on the enemy team with the lowest Def through its next action. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

entries.name: TDC Close Call 1
entries.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 2 (max 20%). If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat.

entries.name: TDC Close Call 2
entries.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 3 (max 30%). If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat.

entries.name: TDC Close Call 3
entries.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%). If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat.

entries.name: TDC Crusader's Ward
entries.description: If unit receives consecutive attacks and foe's Range = 2, reduces damage from foe's second attack onward by 80%. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

entries.name: Daggerbreaker 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a colorless dagger foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Daggerbreaker 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a colorless dagger foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Daggerbreaker 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a colorless dagger foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: TDC Daring Fighter 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 40% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

entries.name: TDC Daring Fighter 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 60% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

entries.name: TDC Daring Fighter 3
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 80% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

entries.name: Dazzling Staff 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, foe cannot counterattack.

entries.name: Dazzling Staff 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, foe cannot counterattack.

entries.name: Dazzling Staff 3
entries.description: Foe cannot counterattack.

entries.name: TD Def Feint 1
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def-3 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

entries.name: TD Def Feint 2
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def-5 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

entries.name: TD Def Feint 3
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def-7 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

entries.name: TD Def/Res Link 1
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Def/Res+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Def/Res Link 2
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Def/Res+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Def/Res Link 3
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Def/Res+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Def/Res Ruse 1
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def/Res-1 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions. 【Guard】 Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: TD Def/Res Ruse 2
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def/Res-3 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions. 【Guard】 Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: TD Def/Res Ruse 3
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Def/Res-5 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions. 【Guard】 Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: TD Deluge Dance 1
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+2 and Res+3 to target.

entries.name: TD Deluge Dance 2
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+3 and Res+4 to target.

entries.name: Desperation 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≤ 25% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

entries.name: Desperation 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≤ 50% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

entries.name: Desperation 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

entries.name: TD Disarm Trap 1
entries.description: While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap and that trap's level ≤ 1, cancels trap's effect.

entries.name: TD Disarm Trap 2
entries.description: While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap and that trap's level ≤ 3, cancels trap's effect.

entries.name: TD Disarm Trap 3
entries.description: While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a Heavy Trap, cancels trap's effect.

entries.name: Double Lion
entries.description: If unit's HP = 100% at start of combat and unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice, but deals 1 damage to unit after combat. (Does not stack.)

entries.name: TD Drag Back
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat. Target foe moves to unit's previous space.

entries.name: Dull Close 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: Dull Close 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: Dull Close 3
entries.description: If foe uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: Dull Ranged 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: Dull Ranged 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: Dull Ranged 3
entries.description: If foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: TD Earth Dance 1
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Def+3 to target.

entries.name: TD Earth Dance 2
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Def+4 to target.

entries.name: TD Earth Dance 3
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Def+5 to target.

entries.name: TD Escape Route 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≤ 30%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

entries.name: TD Escape Route 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≤ 40%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

entries.name: TD Escape Route 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≤ 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

entries.name: TD Fireflood Dance 1
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+2 and Res+3 to target.

entries.name: TD Fireflood Dance 2
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+3 and Res+4 to target.

entries.name: TD Firestorm Dance 1
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk/Spd+2 to target.

entries.name: TD Firestorm Dance 2
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk/Spd+3 to target.

entries.name: TD Flier Formation 1
entries.description: If unit's HP = 100%, unit can move to a space adjacent to a flying ally within 2 spaces .

entries.name: TD Flier Formation 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to a flying ally within 2 spaces .

entries.name: TD Flier Formation 3
entries.description: Unit can move to a space adjacent to a flying ally within 2 spaces .

entries.name: Follow-Up Ring
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

entries.name: TD Freezing Seal
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, inflicts Atk/Spd-6 on foe on the enemy team with the lowest Res through its next action. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

entries.name: G Tomebreaker 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a green tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: G Tomebreaker 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a green tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: G Tomebreaker 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a green tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: TD Gale Dance 1
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+2 to target.

entries.name: TD Gale Dance 2
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+3 to target.

entries.name: TD Gale Dance 3
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+4 to target.

entries.name: TD Geyser Dance 1
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Def/Res+3 to target.

entries.name: TD Geyser Dance 2
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Def/Res+4 to target.

entries.name: Guard 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Guard 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 90%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Guard 3
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 80%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: TD Hit and Run
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat.

entries.name: TDC Killing Intent
entries.description: At start of combat, if foe's HP < 100% or if【Penalty】is active on foe, inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foe, and if unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack. 【Penalty】 All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

entries.name: TD Knock Back
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, target foe moves 1 space away after combat.

entries.name: Lancebreaker 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a lance foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Lancebreaker 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a lance foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Lancebreaker 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a lance foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Light and Dark
entries.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-2 on foe, neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.), and disables foe's skills that "calculate damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res" during combat.

entries.name: TD Live for Bounty
entries.description: If unit survives, get 1.5x shards/crystals from a Training Tower map. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: TD Live for Honor
entries.description: If unit survives, get 1.5x badges from a Training Tower map. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: TD Live to Serve 1
entries.description: When healing an ally with a staff, restores HP to unit = 50% of HP restored to target.

entries.name: TD Live to Serve 2
entries.description: When healing an ally with a staff, restores HP to unit = 75% of HP restored to target.

entries.name: TD Live to Serve 3
entries.description: When healing an ally with a staff, restores HP to unit = HP restored to target.

entries.name: Lull Atk/Def 1
entries.description: Inflicts Atk/Def-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: Lull Atk/Def 2
entries.description: Inflicts Atk/Def-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: Lull Atk/Def 3
entries.description: Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: Lull Atk/Spd 1
entries.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: Lull Atk/Spd 2
entries.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: Lull Atk/Spd 3
entries.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: Lull Spd/Def 1
entries.description: Inflicts Spd/Def-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: Lull Spd/Def 2
entries.description: Inflicts Spd/Def-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: Lull Spd/Def 3
entries.description: Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

entries.name: TDC Lunar Brace
entries.description: Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1). Deals damage = 50% of foe's Def when Special triggers.

entries.name: TD Lunge
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, unit and target foe swap spaces after combat.

entries.name: Mystic Boost 1
entries.description: Disables foe's skills that "calculate damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res" and "calculate damage from staff like other weapons." Restores 2 HP after combat.

entries.name: Mystic Boost 2
entries.description: Disables foe's skills that "calculate damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res" and "calculate damage from staff like other weapons." Restores 4 HP after combat.

entries.name: Mystic Boost 3
entries.description: Disables foe's skills that "calculate damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res" and "calculate damage from staff like other weapons." Restores 6 HP after combat.

entries.name: Null C-Disrupt 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's counterattacks during combat.

entries.name: Null C-Disrupt 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, neutralizes effects that prevent unit's counterattacks during combat.

entries.name: Null C-Disrupt 3
entries.description: Neutralizes effects that prevent unit's counterattacks during combat.

entries.name: Null Follow-Up 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

entries.name: Null Follow-Up 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

entries.name: Null Follow-Up 3
entries.description: Neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

entries.name: TD Obstruct 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

entries.name: TD Obstruct 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

entries.name: TD Obstruct 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

entries.name: Odd Follow-Up 1
entries.description: If it is an odd-numbered turn and unit's HP = 100%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Odd Follow-Up 2
entries.description: If it is an odd-numbered turn and unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Odd Follow-Up 3
entries.description: If it is an odd-numbered turn, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: TD Pass 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 75%, unit can move through foes' spaces.

entries.name: TD Pass 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit can move through foes' spaces.

entries.name: TD Pass 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 25%, unit can move through foes' spaces.

entries.name: Poison Strike 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, deals 4 damage to foe after combat.

entries.name: Poison Strike 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, deals 7 damage to foe after combat.

entries.name: Poison Strike 3
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, deals 10 damage to foe after combat.

entries.name: Quick Riposte 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

entries.name: Quick Riposte 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 80% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

entries.name: Quick Riposte 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

entries.name: R Tomebreaker 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a red tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: R Tomebreaker 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a red tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: R Tomebreaker 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a red tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: TD Recover Ring
entries.description: At start of turn, restores 10 HP. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

entries.name: TD Renewal 1
entries.description: At the start of every fourth turn, restores 10 HP.

entries.name: TD Renewal 2
entries.description: At the start of every third turn, restores 10 HP.

entries.name: TD Renewal 3
entries.description: At the start of every second turn, restores 10 HP.

entries.name: TD Res Feint 1
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Res-3 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

entries.name: TD Res Feint 2
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Res-5 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

entries.name: TD Res Feint 3
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Res-7 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

entries.name: TD Rockslide Dance 1
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+2 and Def+3 to target.

entries.name: TD Rockslide Dance 2
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+3 and Def+4 to target.

entries.name: TD S Drink
entries.description: At the start of turn 1, restores 99 HP and grants Special cooldown count-1.

entries.name: TD Sabotage Atk 1
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk-3 on that foe through its next action.

entries.name: TD Sabotage Atk 2
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk-5 on that foe through its next action.

entries.name: TD Sabotage Atk 3
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk-7 on that foe through its next action.

entries.name: TD Sabotage Def 1
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Def-3 on that foe through its next action.

entries.name: TD Sabotage Def 2
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Def-5 on that foe through its next action.

entries.name: TD Sabotage Def 3
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Def-7 on that foe through its next action.

entries.name: TD Sabotage Res 1
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Res-3 on that foe through its next action.

entries.name: TD Sabotage Res 2
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Res-5 on that foe through its next action.

entries.name: TD Sabotage Res 3
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Res-7 on that foe through its next action.

entries.name: TD Sabotage Spd 1
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit’s Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Spd-3 on that foe through its next action.

entries.name: TD Sabotage Spd 2
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit’s Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Spd-5 on that foe through its next action.

entries.name: TD Sabotage Spd 3
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit’s Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Spd-7 on that foe through its next action.

entries.name: Sacae's Blessing
entries.description: If foe uses sword, lance, or axe, foe cannot counterattack. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

entries.name: TD Seal Atk 1
entries.description: Inflicts Atk-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Atk 2
entries.description: Inflicts Atk-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Atk 3
entries.description: Inflicts Atk-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Atk/Def 1
entries.description: Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Atk/Def 2
entries.description: Inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Atk/Spd 1
entries.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Atk/Spd 2
entries.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Def 1
entries.description: Inflicts Def-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Def 2
entries.description: Inflicts Def-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Def 3
entries.description: Inflicts Def-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Def/Res 1
entries.description: Inflicts Def/Res-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Def/Res 2
entries.description: Inflicts Def/Res-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Res 1
entries.description: Inflicts Res-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Res 2
entries.description: Inflicts Res-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Res 3
entries.description: Inflicts Res-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Spd 1
entries.description: Inflicts Spd-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Spd 2
entries.description: Inflicts Spd-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Spd 3
entries.description: Inflicts Spd-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Spd/Def 1
entries.description: Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Seal Spd/Def 2
entries.description: Inflicts Spd/Def-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

entries.name: TD Shield Pulse 1
entries.description: At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack triggers Special, grants Special cooldown count-1.

entries.name: TD Shield Pulse 2
entries.description: At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack triggers Special, grants Special cooldown count-1. Reduces damage dealt to unit by 5 when Special triggers.

entries.name: TD Shield Pulse 3
entries.description: At the start of turn 1, if foe's attack triggers Special, grants Special cooldown count-2. Reduces damage dealt to unit by 5 when Special triggers.

entries.name: TDC Solar Brace
entries.description: Restores HP = 30% of damage dealt when Special triggers. (Stacks with effects of skills like Sol .)

entries.name: TDC Soul of Zofia
entries.description: Neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks or prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

entries.name: TD Spd/Def Link 1
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Def+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Spd/Def Link 2
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Def+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Spd/Def Link 3
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Def+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Spd Feint 1
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd-3 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

entries.name: TD Spd Feint 2
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd-5 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

entries.name: TD Spd Feint 3
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd-7 on foes in cardinal directions of unit through their next actions.

entries.name: TD Spd/Res Link 1
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Res+2 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Spd/Res Link 2
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Res+4 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Spd/Res Link 3
entries.description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Spd/Res+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

entries.name: TD Spd/Res Ruse 1
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-1 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions. 【Guard】 Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: TD Spd/Res Ruse 2
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-3 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions. 【Guard】 Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: TD Spd/Res Ruse 3
entries.description: If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets unit, inflicts Spd/Res-5 and【Guard】on foes in cardinal directions of unit and target through their next actions. 【Guard】 Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Special Fighter 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 90%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Special Fighter 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 70%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Special Fighter 3
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: TD Special Spiral 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat and unit's Special triggers before or during combat, grants Special cooldown count-1 after combat.

entries.name: TD Special Spiral 2
entries.description: If Special triggers before or during combat, grants Special cooldown count-1 after combat.

entries.name: TD Special Spiral 3
entries.description: If Special triggers before or during combat, grants Special cooldown count-2 after combat.

entries.name: TD Sudden Panic 1
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-5 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts 【Panic】on that foe. 【Panic】 Converts bonuses on target into penalties through its next action.

entries.name: TD Sudden Panic 2
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts 【Panic】on that foe. 【Panic】 Converts bonuses on target into penalties through its next action.

entries.name: TD Sudden Panic 3
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-1 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts 【Panic】on that foe. 【Panic】 Converts bonuses on target into penalties through its next action.

entries.name: Swordbreaker 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a sword foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Swordbreaker 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a sword foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Swordbreaker 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a sword foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: TD Torrent Dance 1
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Res+3 to target.

entries.name: TD Torrent Dance 2
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Res+4 to target.

entries.name: TD Torrent Dance 3
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Res+5 to target.

entries.name: Vantage 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≤ 25% and foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack.

entries.name: Vantage 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≤ 50% and foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack.

entries.name: Vantage 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≤ 75% and foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack.

entries.name: Vengeful Fighter 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% and foe initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

entries.name: Vengeful Fighter 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% and foe initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

entries.name: Vengeful Fighter 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack. (Does not stack.)

entries.name: TD Warp Powder
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 80%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces.

entries.name: Wary Fighter 1
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 90%, unit and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Wary Fighter 2
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70%, unit and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Wary Fighter 3
entries.description: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

entries.name: Watersweep 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat , unit cannot make a follow-up attack. If unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+5 and foe uses magic, staff, or dragonstone, foe cannot counterattack.

entries.name: Watersweep 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat , unit cannot make a follow-up attack. If unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+3 and foe uses magic, staff, or dragonstone, foe cannot counterattack.

entries.name: Watersweep 3
entries.description: If unit initiates combat , unit cannot make a follow-up attack. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd and foe uses magic, staff, or dragonstone, foe cannot counterattack.

entries.name: Windsweep 1
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, unit cannot make a follow-up attack. If unit’s Spd ≥ foe’s Spd+5 and foe uses sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast damage, foe cannot counterattack.

entries.name: Windsweep 2
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, unit cannot make a follow-up attack. If unit’s Spd ≥ foe’s Spd+3 and foe uses sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast damage, foe cannot counterattack.

entries.name: Windsweep 3
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, unit cannot make a follow-up attack. If unit’s Spd > foe’s Spd and foe uses sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast damage, foe cannot counterattack.

entries.name: TD Wings of Mercy 1
entries.description: If an ally's HP ≤ 30%, unit can move to a space adjacent to that ally.

entries.name: TD Wings of Mercy 2
entries.description: If an ally's HP ≤ 40%, unit can move to a space adjacent to that ally.

entries.name: TD Wings of Mercy 3
entries.description: If an ally's HP ≤ 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to that ally.

entries.name: TDC Wrath 1
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 25% and unit's attack triggers Special, grants Special cooldown count-1, and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

entries.name: TDC Wrath 2
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50% and unit's attack triggers Special, grants Special cooldown count-1, and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

entries.name: TDC Wrath 3
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit's attack triggers Special, grants Special cooldown count-1, and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

entries.name: TDC Wrathful Staff 1
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, calculates damage from staff like other weapons.

entries.name: TDC Wrathful Staff 2
entries.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, calculates damage from staff like other weapons.

entries.name: TDC Wrathful Staff 3
entries.description: Calculates damage from staff like other weapons.

entries.name: TD Yune's Whispers
entries.description: At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk/Spd-6 on that foe through its next action.
